title: Palantir up 1,700% since NYSE debut five years ago. How it got there
description: Palantir's government business along with developments in artificial intelligence have helped push the company's market value past $430 billion.
content:
Andrew Kelly | Reutersa
When Palantir hit the stock market in September 2020, there was a lot that could go wrong. The Covid pandemic was sweeping across the globe, society was in lockdown and markets were volatile.

title: South Korean president to meet with OpenAI CEO on Wednesday
description: OpenAI Chief Executive Sam Altman on Wednesday plans to meet with South Korean President Lee Jae Myung, who seeks to boost Asia's fourth-biggest economy through a policy of boosting investment in artificial intelligence, the presidential office has said.

title: AI startup Character.AI removes Disney characters from its chatbot platform after legal letter
description: Artificial intelligence start-up Character.AI has removed Disney characters from its chatbot platform after the Burbank media and entertainment giant sent a cease-and-desist letter earlier this month.
content: In the latest salvo between Hollywood and artificial intelligence companies, tech start-up Character.AI has removed many Disney characters from its chatbot platform after the Burbank entertainment giant sent the firm a cease-and-desist letter, allegi... [1923 chars]

title: AI meets pediatric cancer: Trump signs order to accelerate research and cure
description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order on September 30 to expand the use of artificial intelligence in pediatric cancer research, providing an additional $50 million in NIH grants. The move aims to improve diagnoses, treatments, and prevention strategies for childhood cancers.
content: US President Donald Trump on Tuesday (September 30) signed an executive order aimed at expanding the use of artificial intelligence in pediatric cancer research and providing an additional $50 million in competitive research grants to find cures for ... [2250 chars]

title: AI tool helps researchers treat child epilepsy
description: An artificial intelligence tool that can detect tiny, hard-to-spot brain malformations in children with epilepsy could help patients access life-changing surgery quicker, Australian researchers said on Wednesday. It is the latest example of how AI, which can crunch vast amounts of data, is changing healthcare by assisting doctors with diagnoses.…
content:
An artificial intelligence tool that can detect tiny, hard-to-spot brain malformations in children with epilepsy could help patients access life-changing surgery quicker, Australian researchers said on Wednesday.

title: Amazon unveils new generation of AI-powered Kindle
description: Online juggernaut Amazon Inc. unveiled its next generation of Kindle, Ring and Echo devices, among other gadgets, that are all powered by artificial intelligence and connected to Alexa+, its AI-infused personal assistant, which made its debut in February.

title: Trump signs executive order using AI for pediatric cancer
description: The White House announced a $50 million investment in artificial intelligence research to predict cancer progression and minimize treatment side effects in children.
content:
President Donald Trump signed an executive order Tuesday aimed at improving ways to identify and treat pediatric cancers using artificial intelligence.
